post.body: oh, and I forgot: loads of children's books and fairy tales, in various languages.
As the elderly from Michigan would say: perfect snow for doing donuts on shopping center parking lots!!
I'm with Tina: I vaguely remember you channeling it down :-)
It's a noun that means: a sudden, unforeseen event, in particular an instance of love at first sight.
I have lots of classics, obviously, lots of science, some modern stuff, love Hornby, some gardening/hobby stuff... and more!
so what do you do for fun between reading and tweeting? ;-)
WOW! Looks like my own living room, your bookshelf. But maybe you're right... still I just LOVE paper.
Ouch!!! That one hurt! The classics on the iPhone?? Great, but they still belong in hard cover, leather-bound on the shelf IMHO
Re: karmapa controversy... don't get me wrong and with all due respect to good connections to the upper levels: it's a guy thing.
The concept MUST come first, otherwise, you are left with lots of fluff and no substance.
See, that's what I don't get. It like making an omelette w/o eggs. t
That's wonderful. Sketching is the most successful way. I literally have to teach my students how to do it.
are you familiar with Paul Celan? The Corona?
Do go on ... ;-)
alle knochen wieder an ort und stelle?
well, my detroit mind is not e-v-e-n gonna go there ;-)
I like it. I'll bet I'm not the only girl saying that, either...
on the other hand... what's gotten into you? Fear? Greed? no! no!
I'm off to bed now, too! G'night.
The words of the day screensaver is divine magic to me, today's favorite: coup de foudre!!! gotta love that.
So! For those interested, this was last night's office party in one photo...http://twitpic.com/ttqy
Good morning everyone!
Great word/noun to describe twitter friends et al appeared on my screensaver: "kith"
eggs up in the kitchen!
good and last morning of 2008!!
And when that little task is completed, I'm off to bed. Good night, all!
And due to the subzero temperatures at the funeral, daughter is now learning how "steam inhalation" works for a stuffed nose.
http://twitpic.com/y0ne this was our wreath...
Just got back from another funeral.
time for bed, again... yah! good night all!
that was after the ultra-quick history lesson. gaza strip, west bank etc. where, why, etc.
while shucking peanuts, he says: they could live in peace down there with each other if they wanted to. uhm, yes. they could, I think.
all heaters at full blast, wrapped in thick blankets, still cold. ah, winter has arrived.
whew. that was a very bizarre time warp blip thing. Took another sip, just to make sure ;-)
Was it the red wine or why have the little avatar pictures all disappeared?
status is still wobbly but out of bed, at least. thinking about going to a movie tonight but Australia is just plain too long.
good morning! waking up...
still unable to leave bed for very long, but fever gone, voice back!
Merry Christmas! Excited to be awake before the East Coast wakes up to their wonderful morning!
bless @ATG too.
